:py:mod:`VAMToolbox.optimizer.FBP`
==================================

.. py:module:: VAMToolbox.optimizer.FBP


Module Contents
---------------


Functions
~~~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   VAMToolbox.optimizer.FBP.min_FBP



.. py:function:: min_FBP(target_geo, proj_geo, options)

   Filtered backprojection (no optimization, only filtered)

   :param target_geo:
   :type target_geo: geometry.TargetGeometry object
   :param proj_geo:
   :type proj_geo: geometry.ProjectionGeometry object
   :param options:
   :type options: Options object

   :returns: * *geometry.Sinogram* -- optimized sinogram
             * *geometry.Reconstruction* -- reconstruction from non-filtered backprojection of the
               optimized reconstructions
